Feature Notes:
Animal Companion: Special bond and abilities

Wild Stride: Self and animal companion may move normally through natural hazards while in favored terrain
Woodland Stride: May move normally through undergrowth

Spells:
Ironwood (Woodforging6 Tran): Make 50 lb wood object as strong as steel, or 25 lb object as strong as steel and +1 magic, for 10 dy
Raise Dead (Companion Soul5 Conj): Restores willing soul, dead up to 10 dy, to its touched corpse
Scrying (Companion Soul4 Divi): Self views target for 10 min (DC 16 Will neg)
Speak With Animals (Animal Speech1 Divi): Self converses w/animals for 10 min
Speak With Plants (Plant Speech2 Divi): Self converses w/plants for 10 min
Wood Shape (Woodforging2 Tran): Self shapes 20' cu of wood (DC 14 Will neg)
Magic Notes:
Caster Level Bonus: +7 base class level for spells known and spells per day
Spell Focus (Conjuration): +1 Spell DC (Conjuration)
Wisdom Ranger Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level R1, R2
Animal Speech: May use Speak With Animals effects at will in favored terrain, 1/dy elsewhere
Companion Soul: May use Scrying and Raise Dead effects on animal companion
Extend Spell: May use +1 spell slot to dbl chosen spell duration
Ironpaw: May give summoned creatures DR 10/cold iron/Natural weapons are considered cold iron for overcoming DR
Plant Speech: May use Speak With Plants effects at will in favored terrain, 1/dy elsewhere
Silverclaw: Summoned creatures gain DR 10/silver/Natural weapons are considered silver for overcoming DR
Woodforging: May combine Wood Shape and Ironwood effects 1/dy
Companions
Animal Companion: Pony "Mylittle"

Companion Notes:
Companion Bond (Nature Warden): Has Empathic Link feature
Companion Bond (Nature Warden)-1: Companion shares Favored Terrain benefits
Companion Evasion: Reflex save yields no damage instead of half
Companion Soul: Additional +4 Will vs. enchantment
Companion Walk: May affect companion w/self travel and polymorph spells
Devotion: +4 Will vs. enchantment
Empathic Link: May share emotions up to 1 mile
Eye For Talent: Animal companion, bonded mount, cohort, or familiar gains +2 on choice of ability
Ironpaw: May give animal companion DR 10/cold iron/Natural weapons are considered cold iron for overcoming DR
Multiattack: Reduces additional attack penalty to -2 or gives second attack at -5
Share Spells: Master may share self spell w/adjacent companion
Silverclaw: Animal companion gains DR 10/silver/Natural weapons are considered silver for overcoming DR
